text:
Noémi Ban (;;; September 29, 1922 – June 7, 2019) was a Hungarian-born American Jew. She was a survivor of the Holocaust. She was a Golden Apple Award-winning lecturer. She was a known public speaker and teacher in Washington state. Ban was born in Szeged, Kingdom of Hungary.
Ban died on June 7, 2019 in Bellingham, Washington at the age of 96.
